memberdef.argsstring: (integer i, integer j, real_type bili3[4][4]) const
memberdef.name: load

memberdef.argsstring: (real_type x, real_type y, real_type d[3]) const override
memberdef.name: D

detaileddescription.para:
value and first derivatives at point $ (x,y) $
d[0] value of the spline $ S(x,y) $
d[1] derivative respect to $ x $ of the spline: $ S_x(x,y) $
d[2] derivative respect to $ y $ of the spline: $ S_y(x,y) $
first derivatives respect to $ x $ at point $ (x,y) $ of the spline: $ S_x(x,y) $
first derivatives respect to $ y $ at point $ (x,y) $ of the spline: $ S_y(x,y) $

memberdef.argsstring: (real_type x, real_type y, real_type dd[6]) const override
memberdef.name: DD

detaileddescription.para:
value, first and second derivatives at point $ (x,y) $
d[0] value of the spline $ S(x,y) $
d[1] derivative respect to $ x $ of the spline: $ S_x(x,y) $
d[2] derivative respect to $ y $ of the spline: $ S_y(x,y) $
d[3] second derivative respect to $ x $ of the spline: $ S_{xx}(x,y) $
d[4] mixed second derivative: $ S_{xy}(x,y) $
d[5] second derivative respect to $ y $ of the spline: $ S_{yy}(x,y) $
second derivatives respect to $ x $ at point $ (x,y) $ of the spline: $ S_{xx}(x,y) $
second derivatives respect to $ y $ at point $ (x,y) $ of the spline: $ S_{yy}(x,y) $

briefdescription.para: Cancel the support points, empty the spline.
return the number of support points of the spline along x direction
return the number of support points of the spline along y direction
return the i-th node of the spline (x component).
return the i-th node of the spline (y component).
return the i-th node of the spline (y component).

memberdef.argsstring: (real_type const *x, integer incx, real_type const *y, integer incy, real_type const *z, integer ldZ, integer nx, integer ny, bool fortran_storage=false, bool transposed=false)
memberdef.name: build

detaileddescription.para:
Build surface spline
x
vector of x-coordinates
incx
access elements as x[0], x[incx], x[2*incx],...
y
vector of y-coordinates
incy
access elements as y[0], y[incy], x[2*incy],...
z
matrix of z-values
ldZ
leading dimension of the matrix. Elements are stored by row Z(i,j) = z[i*ldZ+j] as C-matrix
nx
total number of points in direction x
ny
total number of points in direction y
fortran_storage
if true elements are stored by column i.e. Z(i,j) = z[i+j*ldZ] as Fortran-matrix
transposed
if true matrix Z is stored transposed

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< real_type > const &x, vector< real_type > const &y, vector< real_type > const &z, bool fortran_storage=false, bool transposed=false)
memberdef.name: build

detaileddescription.para:
Build surface spline
x
vector of x-coordinates, nx = x.size()
y
vector of y-coordinates, ny = y.size()
z
matrix of z-values. Elements are stored by row Z(i,j) = z[i*ny+j] as C-matrix
fortran_storage
if true elements are stored by column i.e. Z(i,j) = z[i+j*nx] as Fortran-matrix
transposed
if true matrix Z is stored transposed

memberdef.argsstring: (real_type const *z, integer ldZ, integer nx, integer ny, bool fortran_storage=false, bool transposed=false)
memberdef.name: build

parameterdescription.para: matrix of z-values. Elements are stored by row Z(i,j) = z[i*ny+j] as C-matrix
leading dimension of the matrix. Elements are stored by row Z(i,j) = z[i*ldZ+j] as C-matrix
if true elements are stored by column i.e. Z(i,j) = z[i+j*nx] as Fortran-matrix
if true matrix Z is stored transposed

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< real_type > const &z, integer nx, integer ny, bool fortran_storage=false, bool transposed=false)
memberdef.name: build

parameterdescription.para: matrix of z-values. Elements are stored by row Z(i,j) = z[i*ny+j] as C-matrix. ldZ leading dimension of the matrix is ny for C-storage and nx for Fortran storage.
if true elements are stored by column i.e. Z(i,j) = z[i+j*nx] as Fortran-matrix
if true matrix Z is stored transposed

briefdescription.para: return a string with information about the spline.
write a string with information about the spline.
